content: st row 23 k2tog 6 times k1 7 sts making up for the body sew the side edges decrease pull through to cast off stuffing the head cast off end and lightly stuffing the narrower body and gather the cast on sts decrease at the tail note the seam runs along the centre snail shell top of the body bring the 2 cast on/off tails up make 1 per snail cast on 9 sts using 3 25mm through the body and out at the top of the head to single pointed needles and chocolate brown yarn make the antennae and trim the yarn so each start at the bottom edge antenna is 1cm long sew on 4mm buttons for row 1 to 2 starting on a rs knit row work 2 row eyes on either side of the head for the shell sew in st st side edges decrease stuffing as you sew and gather cast on sts decrease at bottom sew bottom of shell on top row 3 rs k1 kfb 7 times k1 16 sts of the snail body autumn warmth wreath copyright © 2024 amanda berry page 16 of 19 squirrel squirrel arms & legs make 4 per squirrel cast on 6 sts using 3 25mm single pointed needles and orange yarn squirrel body row 1 to 7 starting on a rs knit row work 7 row make 1 per squirrel cast on in st st 10 sts using 3 25mm single pointed needles and orange pull through to cast off yarn start at the bottom row 1 to 2 starting on a rs knit row work 2 row in st st row 3 rs k1 kfb 8 times k1 18 sts row 4 to 15 starting on a ws purl row work 12 row in st st row 16 p2 p2tog p1 5 times p1 13 sts cast off all sts squirrel ears squirrel head make 2 per squirrel cast on 4 sts using 3 25mm make 1 per squirrel cast on 10 sts using 3 25mm single pointed needles and orange yarn single pointed needles and orange yarn start at the back row 1 to 3 k3 sl1 wyif row 1 to 3 follow the squirrel body patt row row 4 k1 k2tog sl1 wyif 3 sts 1 to 3 18 sts row 5 k2tog sl1 wyif 2 sts row 4 ws purl pull through to cast off row 5 k1 kfb k1 8 times k1 26 sts row 6 to 11 starting on a ws purl row work 6 squirrel tail row in st st make 1 per squirrel cast on 7 sts using 3 25mm row 12 p5 p2tog p2 4 times p5 22 sts single pointed needles and orange yarn row 13 knit row 1 rs k1 kfb 5 times k1 12 sts row 14 p5 p2tog p1 4 times p5 18 sts row 2 to 18 knit row 15 knit row 19 k2tog 6 times 6 sts row 16 p2 p2tog
